titleStmt.title: A pleasant comedie, entituled Hey for honesty, down with knavery translated out of Aristophanes his Plutus by Tho. Randolph, augmented and published by F.J.
titleStmt.author: Randolph, Thomas, 1605-1635.
Jaques, Francis, fl. 1642.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
An adaptation of the Plutus of Aristophanes ascribed to Thomas Randolph, and augmented by F.J. (i.e. Francis Jacques?) cf. Brit. Mus. Cat.
